name: Ocean Energy Europe
goal:
Ocean Energy Europe is a membership organisation set up to represent the ocean energy sector to the European Commission, Parliament and Council.

OEE acts as a hub for information and networking for European industry players, the research community, national trade associations and Member States.

OEE's goal is to leverage financial and political support for the ocean energy sector. OEE works closely with the Commission and Member State authorities to promote a level playing field for ocean energy developers in the single European market.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Energy and climate policy
Energy Union
Renewable energy
Energy Market
European Framework for Strategi Investment
R&D policy, SET-Plan
Horizon 2020
Blue growth and maritime affairs
